item.title: Poetry
item.description: Lǎozǐ # I am partial to the translation of Derek Lin Dàodéjīng - Chapter 11 (The use of what has no substantive existence) [...] Mix clay to create a container In its emptiness, there is the function of a container [...] Therefore, that which exists is used to create benefit That which is empty is used to create functionality Dàodéjīng - Chapter 15 (The exhibition of the qualities of the Dao) The Tao masters of antiquity

item.title: Test page
item.description: Year numbering system # I use the Holocene Era or Human Era numbering system. It adds exactly 10,000 years to the currently dominant AD/BC or CE/BCE numbering system. It is denoted HE/BHE and allows for all key dates in human history to be listed using a simle increasing date scale - while keeping the transition from the CE calendar easy: you just add the digit “1” before the current year.
